messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I love Pokémon that smell sweet.
Like this one--get a whiff of this!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Did you understand what I meant?
Didn’t my Pokémon smell nice?
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
If you plant lots of Berries, you
can be surrounded by sweet scents.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Sniff... Oh?
Your Pokémon smells nice!
